original: Ariyarūpaṁ anāsavaṁ asaṁyojaniyaṁ aganthaniyaṁ anoghaniyaṁ ayoganiyaṁ anīvaraṇiyaṁ aparāmaṭṭhaṁ anupādāniyaṁ asaṅkilesiyanti?
analyzed: ▁ariy arūp aṃ ▁an āsav aṃ ▁as aṃ yojan iyaṃ ▁a ganth aniy aṃ ▁an o gh aniy aṃ ▁a yog aniy aṃ ▁a nīvaraṇ iyaṃ ▁a parāmaṭṭh aṃ ▁an upādān iyaṃ ▁as aṃ kiles iy anti
▁mahābhūtā ▁an āsav ā ▁pe ▁as aṃ kiles iyā ti
▁ariy arūp aṃ ▁s āsav aṃ ▁saṃyojan iyaṃ ▁pe ▁saṃkiles iy anti

original: “yaṁ kiñci, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṁ upādāyarūpan”ti.
analyzed: ▁yaṃ ▁kiñci ▁bhikkhave ▁rūpaṃ ▁cattāri ▁mahābhūtā ni ▁catu n n añca ▁mahābhūtā naṃ ▁upādāya rūp anti
